author: detroitnews.com
title: Entertainment calendar
text:
DJ Zedd will perform electronic music at Masonic Temple on Friday. (Photo: David Becker / Getty Images) 
big shows 
THURSDAY 
Lee Bice with Lewis Brice and Matt Austin at Fillmore Detroit, country, 7 p.m. Thurs. $29.50-$45. 2115 Woodward, Detroit. (313) 961-5450.
Ed Kowalczyk performing “Throwing Copper” unplugged at the Ark, rock, 8 p.m. Thurs. $30. 316 S. Main, Ann Arbor. (734) 761-1451.
FRIDAY 
The Wonder Years and Motion City Soundtrack at Fillmore Detroit, rock, 6 p.m. Fillmore Detroit, $25-$35. 2115 Woodward, Detroit. (313) 961-5450.
Zedd at Masonic Temple, electronic, 8 p.m. Fri. $36. 500 Temple, Detroit. (313) 638-2724.
Adam Carolla live podcast at Royal Oak Music Theatre, comedy, 8 p.m. Fri. $35-$45. 318 W. Fourth, Royal Oak. (248) 399-2980.
Train at Caesars Windsor, rock, 9 p.m. Fri. $40 Canadian and up. 377 Riverside Drive East, Windsor. (800) 991-7777.
SATURDAY 
STS9 at Fillmore Detroit, rock/electronic, 7 p.m. Sat. $32-$40. 2115 Woodward, Detroit. (313) 961-5450.
Run the Jewels at Royal Oak Music Theatre, hip-hop, 8 p.m. Sat. $25 and up. 318 W. Fourth, Royal Oak. (248) 399-2980.
Regis Philbin at Andiamo Celebrity Showroom, comedy, 8 p.m. Sat. $25-$99. 7096 E. 14 Mile, Warren. (586) 268-3200.
Mavis Staples at Macomb Center for the Performing Arts, Gospel, 8 p.m. Sat. $40 and up. 44575 Garfield, Clinton Township. (586) 286-2222.
Kurt Vile and the Violators with Waxahatchee and Luke Roberts at Saint Andrew’s Hall, rock, 9:30 p.m. Sat. $20. 431 E. Congress, Detroit. (313) 961-8961.
SUNDAY 
Motionless in White and the Devil Wears Prada with the Word Alive, Upon a Burning Body and the Color Morale at Fillmore Detroit, rock, 5:30 p.m. Sun. $22-$35. 2115 Woodward, Detroit. (313) 961-5450.
Mayday Parade with Real Friends, This Wild Live and As It Is at Crofoot Ballroom, rock, 5:30 p.m. Sun. $25. 1 S. Saginaw, Pontiac. (248) 858-9333.
Bill Burr at Fox Theatre, comedy, 7 p.m. Sun. $33-$43. 2211 Woodward, Detroit. (313) 471-6611.
Lee Ann Womack at the Ark, country/rockabilly, 7:30 p.m. Sun. $25. 316 S. Main, Ann Arbor. (734) 761-1451.
MONDAY 
Collective Soul at Saint Andrew’s Hall, rock, 7 p.m. Mon. $33. 431 E. Congress, Detroit. (313) 961-8961.
Jesse Cook at Royal Oak Music Theatre, flamenco/world music, 7 p.m. Mon. $29.50-$45. 318 W. Fourth, Royal Oak. (248) 399-2980.
WEDNESDAY 
Steve Aoki and A-Trak at Fillmore Detroit, electronic, 7 p.m. Wed. $20-$45. 2115 Woodward, Detroit. (313) 961-5450.
live music 
THIS WEEK 
Ian Finkelstein at Dirty Dog Jazz Cafe, jazz, 6 and 8:30 p.m. Thurs.-Sat. $15, no cover Thursday. 97 Kercheval, Grosse Pointe Farms. (313) 882-5299.
Detroit Symphony Orchestra “Mozart’s A Light Night Music” at Orchestra Hall at the Max, classical, 10:45 a.m. Fri. and 3 p.m. Sun. $15-$100. 3711 Woodward, Detroit. (313) 576-5111.
The Bill Held Piano Trio at Cliff Bell’s, jazz, 9 p.m. Fri. and 9:30 p.m. Sat. $10. 2030 Park, Detroit. (313) 961-2543.
THURSDAY 
Robb Banks with Indigochildrick, Wifisfuneral and more at Crofoot Ballroom, hip-hop, 5 p.m. Thurs. $15 and up. 1 S. Saginaw, Pontiac. (248) 858-9333.
Andy Mineo at Saint Andrew’s Hall, hip-hop, 6 p.m. Thurs. $20. 431 E. Congress, Detroit. (313) 961-8961.
Edgefest with Rob Mazurek at Kerrytown Concert House, jazz, 6 p.m. Thurs. $15, $5 student. Edgefest runs through Saturday with multiple events each day. 415 N. Fourth, Ann Arbor. kerrytownconcerthouse.com.
Blues Feast with Corey Dennison Band at the Root Restaurant & Bar, blues, 6:30 p.m. seating, 7 p.m. dinner. $65 includes dinner, $25 in addition for beverage pairings. 340 Town Center, White Lake. Reservations required by calling (248) 698-2400.
Suburban Soul Surfers at Freddy’s Bar, rock, 7 p.m. Thurs. 40000 Garfield, Clinton Township. (586) 416-7777.
The HandGrenades unplugged at InkAddict Flagship, rock, 8 p.m. Thurs. $2. 22007 Woodward, Ferndale. hipindetroit.com.
IAMX at Shelter, synthpop, 9 p.m. Thurs. $20. 431 E. Congress, Detroit. (313) 961-8961.
FRIDAY 
Smallpools with Phoebe Ryan and machineheart at Saint Andrew’s Hall, indiepop, 6 p.m. Fri. $15. 431 E. Congress, Detroit. (313) 961-8961.
New Year’s Day with Get Scared, Eyes Set to Kill and New Volume at Hatchy’s, rock, 6 p.m. Fri. $13.50 in advance, $15 at the door. 7759 Auburn, Utica. (248) 858-9333.
Creepy Cheapy Halloween show at Crofoot Complex, rock, 7 p.m. Fri. $5 in advance, $10 at the door. 1 S. Saginaw, Pontiac. (248) 858-9333.
Christian McBride Big Band at Orchestra Hall at the Max, jazz, 8 p.m. Fri. $19-$99. 3711 Woodward, Detroit. (313) 576-5111.
Pinky Doodle Poodle with Dear Darkness and Julian Paaige at Small’s Bar, rock, 8 p.m. Fri. $7. 10339 Conant, Hamtramck. (313) 873-1117.
The Counter Elites, High Arrow, Cosmic Light Shapes and Charley Crystal at PJ’s Lager House, rock, 9 p.m. Fri. $6. 1254 Michigan, Detroit. (313) 961-2668.
Cheatahs, Reverend, Palaces and Wasabi Dream at Majestic Cafe, pop/rock, 9 p.m. Fri. $8 in advance, $10 day of. 4120 Woodward, Detroit. (313) 833-9700.
Shannon & the Clams with Shopping, Rebel Kind and Prude Boys at UFO Factory, rock, 9 p.m. Fri. $12. 2110 Trumbull, Detroit. ufofactory.com.
Nadir at CJ’s Lounge at Captain Joe’s Grill, funk, 10:30 p.m. Fri. No cover. 9901 N. Main, Whitmore Lake. (734) 257-9000.
SATURDAY 
Rock O’Ween with Candy Band at Music Box at the Max, rock/Halloween, 10 a.m. Sat. $12. 3711 Woodward, Detroit. (313) 576-5111.
Halloween Spooktacular at Orchestra Hall at the Max, classical/Halloween, 11 a.m. Sat. $20-$40. 3711 Woodward, Detroit. (313) 576-5111.
Have Mercy, Transit, Somos and Microwave at Shelter, rock, 5 p.m. Sat. $14. 431 E. Congress, Detroit. (313) 961-8961.
Ian Stewart at Lone Oak Vineyard Estate, rock/folk, 6:30-9:30 p.m. Sat. $25, includes dinner. 8400 Ann Arbor, Grass Lake. Reserve by calling (517) 522-8167.
Universal Stomp at Token Lounge, metal, 8 p.m. Sat. $10. 28949 Joy, Westland. (734) 513-5030.
Ann Arbor Symphony Orchestra “Romantic Tchaikovsky” at Michigan Theater, classical, 8 p.m. Sat. $15 and up. 603 E. Liberty, Ann Arbor. (734) 668-8397.
The Infatuations with the Almighty Get Down at the Ark, rock/soul, 8 p.m. Sat. $15. 316 S. Main, Ann Arbor. (734) 761-1451.
Dirk Kroll Band with the Tom Toms at New Way Bar, pop/rock, 9 p.m. Sat. $7. 23130 Woodward, Ferndale. (248) 541-9870.
Langhorne Slim and the Law with Fort Frances at Blind Pig, alt-country, 9 p.m. Sat. $12 in advance, $14 at the door. 208 S. First, Ann Arbor. (734) 996-8555.
SUNDAY 
Motor City Brass Band “Horns & Howls” at Ford Community and Performing Arts Center, classical/Halloween, 3 p.m. Sun. $14. 15801 Michigan, Dearborn. (313) 943-2354.
A Silent Film at Shelter, rock, 6 p.m. Tues. $15. 431 E. Congress, Detroit. (313) 961-8961.
Joanna Gruesome, Aye Nako, King of Cats and Bobbi Palace at UFO Factory, rock, 9 p.m. Sun. $10. 2110 Trumbull, Detroit. ufofactory.com
MONDAY 
Escape the Fate and more at Crofoot, punk/rock, 6 p.m. Mon. $15 in advance, $17 at the door. 1 S. Saginaw, Pontiac. (248) 858-9333.
Ought with the Witches and the Bruised Reed at Majestic Cafe, pop/rock, 8 p.m. Mon. $10. 4120 Woodward, Detroit. (313) 833-9700.
TUESDAY 
Ethan Bortnick at Ford Community and Performing Arts Center, classical/pop, 7 p.m. Tues. $29-$49. 15801 Michigan, Dearborn. (313) 943-2354.
Patchy Sanders at the Ark, chamber folk, 8 p.m. Tues. Free, nonperishable food donations accepted. 316 S. Main, Ann Arbor. (734) 761-1451.
Detroit Artist Showcase with Destiny at Saint Andrew’s Hall, pop, 9 p.m. Tues. $10. 431 E. Congress, Detroit. (313) 961-8961.
WEDNESDAY 
The Amity Affliction with Chelsea Grin, Secrets, Cruel Hand and the Plot in You at Shelter, metal, 6 p.m. Wed. $16. 431 E. Congress, Detroit. (313) 961-8961.
The Front Bottoms with the Smith Street Band and Elvis Depressedly at Majestic Theatre, indie rock, 6:30 p.m. Wed. $16 in advance, $20 day of. 4140 Woodward, Detroit. (313) 833-9700.
Wayne State University Big Jazz Band at Grosse Pointe War Memorial, 7:30 p.m. Wed. Free. 32 Lake Shore, Grosse Pointe Farms. (313) 332-4074.
Here We Go Magic with Big Thief at UFO Factory, rock, 9 p.m. Wed. $12. 2110 Trumbull, Detroit. ufofactory.com.
stage/comedy 
THIS WEEK 
“Dirty Dancing” at Fisher Theatre, 8 p.m. Thurs.-Fri., 2 and 8 p.m. Sat., 2 and 7:30 p.m. Sun. and 8 p.m. Tues.-Wed. (through Nov. 1). $39 and up. 3011 W. Grand Blvd., Detroit. (313) 872-1000.
“Evil Dead: the Musical” at City Theatre, 8 p.m. Thurs.-Sat. (through Oct. 31). $30. 2301 Woodward, Detroit. (313) 471-3465.
Paul Mecurio at Mark Ridley’s Comedy Castle, 8 p.m. Thurs.-Fri. and 8 and 10:30 p.m. Sat. $20. 310 S. Troy, Royal Oak. (248) 542-9900.
“Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat” at Fox Theatre, 8 p.m. Fri.-Sat. $30-$70. 2211 Woodward, Detroit. (313) 471-6611.
Sankai Juku “UMUSUNA: Memories Before History” at Power Center, 8 p.m. Fri.-Sat. $24 and up. 121 S. Fletcher, Ann Arbor. (734) 764-2538.
FRIDAY 
Turning Point Macomb’s “Stepping Out with the Stars” performance and fundraiser at Villa Penna, 6:30 p.m. Fri. $75. 43985 Hayes, Sterling Heights. (586) 553-4076.
National Circus and Acrobats of the People’s Republic of China “Peking Dreams” at Music Hall Center for the Performing Arts, 8 p.m. Fri. $30-$50. 350 Madison, Detroit. (313) 887-8501.
SATURDAY 
Japanese dance troupe ERNA at Berman Center for the Performing Arts, 8 p.m. Sat. $35-$37. 6600 W. Maple, West Bloomfield. (248) 661-1900.
TUESDAY 
Hubbard Street Dance Chicago at Power Center, 7:30 p.m. Tues. $42 and up. 121 S. Fletcher, Ann Arbor. (734) 764-2538.
WEDNESDAY 
Detroit Public Theatre presents “American Hero” by Bess Wohl at Allesee Hall at the Max, 8 p.m. Wed. (through Nov. 22). $35, pay-what-you-can pricing offered. 3711 Woodward, Detroit. (313) 576-5111.
visual arts/film 
SATURDAY 
HalloScreens film series with “The Rocky Horror Picture Show” at Campus Martius, 7:30 p.m. Sat. Free. 800 Woodward, Detroit. (313) 962-0101.
OPENING SUNDAY 
“Just Desserts” featuring works by Darcel Deneau, Joan Schwartz and Ruth Tyszka at Janice Charach Gallery, 1-4 p.m. opening reception (runs through Dec. 10). 6600 W. Maple, West Bloomfield. (248) 432-5579.
TUESDAY 
“Nosferatu” Michigan Theater, 7 p.m. Tues. $16, $13 students. 603 E. Liberty, Ann Arbor. (734) 668-8397.
WEDNESDAY 
“Scouts Guide to the Zombie Apocalypse” advance screening and visual show from Dillon Francis at AMC Livonia, 7 p.m. Wed. $10.29, $8.79 seniors, $7.29 children. 19500 Haggerty, Livonia. ScoutsAndZombiesMovie.com/ultimatefanexperience.
etc. 
THIS WEEKEND 
Hallowe’en at Greenfield Village, 6:30-9 p.m. Thurs.-Sat. and 6:30-8 p.m. Sun. $16, $13.75 for members. 20900 Oakwood, Dearborn. (313) 982-6001.
Zoo Boo trick-or-treat trail at Detroit Zoo, 5-8 p.m. Fri.-Sun. $8. Free for babies younger than two. 8450 W. 10 Mile, Royal Oak. (248) 541-5717.
Pro Football Hall of Fame Tour “Honor the Heroes” at Cobo Center, 11 a.m.-6 p.m. Sat.-Sun. $25, $100 VIP. 1 Washington Blvd., Detroit. (866) 468-3401.
THURSDAY 
Wine and Dine in the D to benefit Multiple Myeloma Research Foundation at Westin Book Cadillac Hotel, 5:30 p.m. Thurs. $175 and up. 1114 Washington, Detroit. (248) 625-0070 or wineanddineinthed.org.
Covenant House fowling fundraiser at Fowling Warehouse, 6-10 p.m. Thurs. $45, $80 team, $25 spectator. 3901 Christopher, Hamtramck. covenanthousemi.org/fowling .
FRIDAY 
Light Up a Life Gala for Angela Hospice at Laurel Manor, 6-11 p.m. Fri. $100. 39000 Schoolcraft, Livonia. (734) 953-6045.
SATURDAY 
Haunted Kingdom 2015 adult Halloween party with DJs, fortune tellers, performers, confetti cannons, VIP areas and more at Russel Industrial Center, 8 p.m. Sat. $20 and up. 1600 Clay, Detroit. HauntedKingdom.com.
Moon Dusters Ballroom Dancing at Livonia Civic Center, 8:30-11:30 p.m. Sat. $8. 15218 Farmington, Livonia. (248) 968-5197.
SUNDAY 
Treats in the Streets with trick-or-treating and crafts at Detroit Historical Museum, noon-3 p.m. Sun. Free. 5401 Woodward, Detroit. (313) 833-7979.
